title: Ukrainian military had 62 combat engagements with Russian forces near Synkivka of Kharkiv region, Terny of Donetsk region, Be...
content: Ukrainian military had 62 combat engagements with Russian forces near Synkivka of Kharkiv region, Terny of Donetsk region, Berdychi, Umanske, Pervomayske and Nevelske of Donetsk region, Novomykhaylivka and Urozhayne of Donetsk region, Robotyne and north-west Verbove of Zaporizhzhia region, Krynky of Kherson region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
